metadata.description: Official plugin marketplace for The Cat Toolkit - Vibecoding plugins for autonomous AI development.

plugins.name: builder
plugins.description: The Unified Builder: Consolidates planning and engineering into a single cohesive workflow. Features autonomous execution, systematic debugging, and test-driven development.

plugins.name: meta
plugins.description: The Toolkit Builder: Tools to build, maintain, and audit the AI system itself. Includes command creation, agent development, and self-correction (/heal).

plugins.name: strategist
plugins.description: High-level planning and reasoning agents with interactive thinking frameworks and prompt engineering capabilities.
